articles.title: Shweta Tiwari—symphony in saree, radiating grace and glamour - IndiaTimes
articles.description: ​Shweta Tiwari—symphony in saree, radiating grace and glamour​
articles.content: The actress radiates allure, donned in a black saree that shimmers with every movement. This ensemble skillfully blends tradition with a modern, glitzy twist, capturing undeniable elegance.
